message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $150 to me, but I understand its value may vary depending on your needs. To start, I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle at $150?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your input and am willing to consider a middle ground. I would like to counter with an offer of $175 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $175 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $160, but I'd like to try to get closer to my target. Can you meet me at $165?
I understand your position, Bob. I'm glad we're getting closer to finding a fair price. I'm willing to counter with $160 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
